import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; const TripPlanner = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ budget: '', currency: 'USD', startDate: '', endDate: '', theme: '', groupSize: '', startingPoint: '', }); const themes = [ 'Adventure', 'Relaxation', 'Cultural', 'Food & Wine', 'Beach', 'Mountain', 'City Break', 'Romantic' ]; const groupSizes = ['1', '2', '3-4', '5-8', '9+']; const currencies = ['USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'AUD','INR']; const handleInputChange = (field) => (event) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [field]: event.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); setError(''); try { // Convert data types to match backend expectations const requestData = { budget: parseFloat(formData.budget) || 0, currency: formData.currency, startDate: formData.startDate, endDate: formData.endDate, theme: formData.theme, groupSize: parseInt(formData.groupSize) || 1, startingPoint: formData.startingPoint, }; const response = await axios.post('/api/trips/plan', requestData); navigate(`/results/${response.data.id}`); } catch (err) { setError('Failed to plan trip. Please try again.'); console.error('Error planning trip:', err); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const handleClear = () => { setFormData({ budget: '', currency: 'USD', startDate: '', endDate: '', theme: '', groupSize: '', startingPoint: '', }); setError(''); }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

); }; export default TripPlanner;
